data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Puebla have a goal kick.
Salvador Reyes puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 13, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Puebla a goal kick.
Puebla drive forward but Israel Reyes is judged offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Puebla.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 17, In Mexico City Puebla drive forward through Israel Reyes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 20, Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gutierrez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Puebla's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 24, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 27, Pumas UNAM pushes forward through Juan Dinenno, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Puebla drives forward and Pablo Gonzalez Diaz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 29, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Favio Alvarez levels the score at 1-1.
Carlos Gonzalez with an assist there.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Puebla's Omar Fernandez is whistled for offside at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 36, Goal! Carlos Gonzalez gives Pumas UNAM the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 2-1.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Puebla.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 41, Free kick Puebla.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 44, Puebla to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Estadio Olimpico Universitario the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 48, Puebla are in shooting range from this free kick.
Puebla are coming forward and Amaury Escoto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Juan Iturbe (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 49, Alan Mozo is on a sub for Jesus Rivas for Pumas UNAM.
The away team have replaced Alejandro Chumacero with Christian Tabo. This is the first substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Puebla throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Free kick Puebla.
In the minute 56, Nicolas Freire (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Puebla make their second substitution with Alan Acosta replacing Israel Reyes.
Eduardo Herrera is replacing Amaury Escoto for Puebla at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 58, Daniel Arreola (Puebla) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 59, Goal! Pumas UNAM extend their lead to 3-1 through Johan Vasquez.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Alejandro Mayorga (Pumas UNAM) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 62, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Goal! Juan Dinenno extends Pumas UNAM's lead to 4-1.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Facundo Waller is replacing Juan Iturbe for the home team.
The home team replace Juan Dinenno with Leonel Lopez.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Puebla.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
The away team replace Omar Fernandez with Osvaldo Martinez.
In the minute 71, Juan Reynoso (Puebla) is making a fifth substitution, with Emanuel Gularte replacing Salvador Reyes.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Puebla throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 73, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Puebla.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
In the minute 78, Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Mexico City.
Andres Lillini is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Olimpico Universitario with Bryan Mendoza replacing Favio Alvarez.
Brian Figueroa is replacing Carlos Gutierrez for the home team.
In the minute 79, Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Pumas UNAM's area.
Christian Tabo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Puebla.
In the minute 82, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, Emanuel Gularte for Puebla has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Puebla have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Mexico City. The final score is 4-1.
